definitions.definition: a lamp whose beam can be directed, or a circle of light produced by such a lamp
(of a person) receiving a lot of public attention:
examples: The senator has been in the spotlight recently since the revelation of his tax frauds.

definitions.definition: to light something or someone with a spotlight:
examples: The paintings in the alcove were spotlit from below.

definitions.definition: If something spotlights a particular situation, it directs public attention to it.
